author: Don
content:
I am not sure how much you pay, or if you are willing to move to a US based company, but I have been very happy with DreamHost.com.  They charge me around US$9/month for unlimited storage and bandwidth.

If you want to look at it, drop me a line, and we can talk.  Least I can do for all the fun posts you put up. ðŸ™‚
